How to use
You need to incluide the following code, when you provide the renderers, also the vue-template-compiler dependency needes to be defined in your package.json

<v-container fluid><v-row><v-col><monaco-editor :theme='$vuetify.theme.dark ? "vs-dark" : "vs"' height='200'  language='javascript' :options='{ readOnly: true, automaticLayout: true, autoIndent: true, formatOnPaste: true, formatOnType: true, minimap: { enabled: false } }' :code="`const compileToFunctions = () =>
    import('vue-template-compiler').then((module) => {
        const { compileToFunctions } = module;
        return compileToFunctions;
    });
import { advancedVuetifyRenderers } from '@jsonforms/vue2-vuetify';
const vuetifyRenderers = advancedVuetifyRenderers(compileToFunctions);`"></monaco-editor></v-col></v-row></v-container>
